tip1.title: About Chiki
tip1.article: The Chikki App brings all the computer games to your mobile phone through the PC Cloud Game Group. Join and play thousands of player to enjoy your favorite games from anywhere, anytime, anyplace. Mirror the best PC games to your handheld Android screen without having to buy or use a bulky and expensive gaming computer or a PS4. With this option, who needs to go for the old fad? Lets swim with the new tide.

tip2.title: Play the latest games on your Android
tip2.article: Chiki is an emulator that lets you play several PC and video games on your Android device. It is a cloud-based gaming community where users share their video console and PC, so you can play all the games. You can play games anytime, anywhere. When the game opens, you can enjoy the adventure from your smartphone or tablet just as you would from your PC, PS4, or other consoles. Moreover, this app is keyboard compatible for gaming, which provides a full game feel. Without a doubt, this is an excellent tool to enjoy the latest releases in free games.
